meanings.sent1: My dad is proud of his homebuilt bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The homebuilt birdhouse in the backyard is attracting many feathered visitors.
meanings.sent3: The homebuilt robot vacuum kept chasing the cat around the house!
meanings.sent4: Her homebuilt garden shed was a sanctuary in the midst of the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The homebuilt treehouse was a magical hideaway for the children.

meanings.definition: A product or structure that is built by oneself at home
meanings.sent1: The homebuilt computer was faster than any store-bought one.
meanings.sent2: He proudly displayed his homebuilt model airplane on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The homebuilt treehouse became the neighborhood's favorite hangout spot.
meanings.sent4: Her homebuilt business empire started with a single handmade product.
meanings.sent5: The homebuilt go-kart zoomed down the street with a homemade engine roar.
